# Cerebrum Biology Academy
> Best NEET Biology Coaching in Delhi NCR | AIIMS Faculty | 98% Success Rate

## About
Cerebrum Biology Academy is India's premier NEET Biology coaching institute, founded by Dr. Shekhar C Singh (AIIMS alumnus). Established in 2014, we specialize exclusively in Biology coaching for NEET and medical entrance exams.

## Key Facts
- Founded: 2014
- Founder: Dr. Shekhar C Singh (AIIMS Delhi)
- Specialization: NEET Biology Coaching
- Success Rate: 98%
- Students Selected: 500+ into AIIMS, JIPMER, top GMCs
- Centers: 6 locations across Delhi NCR
- Batch Size: Maximum 25 students

## Centers
1. South Extension (Flagship) - Block D, South Extension Part 2, New Delhi 110049
2. Rohini - 211 Vikas Surya Tower, DC Chauk, Sector 9, Delhi 110085
3. Green Park - B 113 FF Gulmohar Park, New Delhi 110049
4. Gurugram - Unit 17, M2K Corporate Park, Sector 51, Gurugram 122018
5. Faridabad - Sector 17, Faridabad 121002
6. Noida - B-45, Sector 62, Noida 201301

## Courses
- NEET Foundation (Class 11) - 2-year program
- NEET Target (Class 12) - 1-year intensive
- NEET Dropper Batch - 1-year program for repeaters
- Weekend Batches - For school-going students
- Online Classes - Pan-India access
